title: Barclays Computers (PVT) Ltd. - HARD SSD-SM2280S3G2/480G - Kingston SSD 480GB M.2  Hard Disk  (2Y)
specs: SSDNow M.2 SATA G2 DriveKingston’s M.2 SATA G2 SSD is a compact, caseless internal solid-state drive that combines high capacity with low power consumption. Lighter weight than a cased SSD, the M.2 SATA G2 SSD optimises performance with advanced garbage collection, wear-levelling, TRIM support1 and DevSleep. Suitable for small-form-factor (SFF) PCs, the M.2 2280 SATA G2 SSD easily integrates into designs with M.2 connectors. The complimentary Kingston SSD Manager (KSM) monitors warranty status and SSD health.Features- Space-saving caseless design fits ultra-thin computing applications- Multi-purpose SFF connector replaces small mSATA and mini-PCIe slots- Single-sided design (120GB/240GB) — Integrates easily into designs with M.2 connectors; ideal for thin-and-light systems.SPECIFICATIONS> Form factor M.2 2280> Interface SATA Rev. 3.0 (6Gb/s) – with backward compatibility to SATA Rev. 2.0> Capacity : 480GB> Sequential Read/Write SATA Rev : to 550/520MB/s> Max 4k Read/Write : up to 90,000/85,000 IOPS> Random 4k Read/Write : up to 80,000/80,000 IOPS> Endurance : 800TB and 0.93 DWPD> Storage temperature : -40°C~85°C> Operating temperature : 0°C~70°C> Dimensions : 80mm x 22mm x 3.5mm> Weight : 7.98
